verbs.description: [ARG0: harvard economist] [V: says] [ARG1: closing the us gender wage gap is n't as simple as equal pay for equal work she says pay parity is n't so much about fighting outright discrimination as it is changing our attitudes about work world economic forum gender claudia goldin harvard university stephen j dubner]
